snippet: Mr. Noble’s interviews on the weekly program called “Like It Is” comprised a veritable archive of contemporary black history in America.
abstract: Gil Noble, television journalist who hosted pioneering program focusing on black issues, dies at age 80.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Noble’s interviews on the weekly program called “Like It Is” comprised a veritable archive of contemporary black history in America.

headline.seo: Gil Noble, Host of Show on Black Issues, Dies at 80
headline.main: Gil Noble, Host of Pioneering TV Show Focusing on Black Issues, Dies at 80
headline.print_headline: Gil Noble, Host of Pioneering TV Show Focusing on Black Issues, Dies at 80
